EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder of Parent Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Parents,
We would like to remind you of the parent workshop that will be held on the Lower School Campus (Lakefront) on Wednesday, 4th June at 4pm.
PLEASE CLICK HERE FOR DETAILS
The workshop is free to all BSG parents and will be presented by a Psychologist and Speech and Language Therapist from the 'Essential Learning Groupâ€™.
Kind regards,
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
